channel.title: [PI] Make smite give you 1/5 hp?
channel.description:
Ok so i changed smite into soul split. and i want it to give 1/5 hp. while smiting. how would i do this?
and if any one knows the gfx for making like the summoning rings around ur player everytime soul split takes hp that would be great
